Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great staff fast service very clean good location easy transportation nearby great for my baby they have provided us with both a bath and a crib

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: This hotel is just a room There is nothing more very expensive 212 night Does not correspond to the price quality People came in from the street and they were offered a price of 620 4 night Of course my husband and I were outraged because we pre ordered And
Positive_Review: The room Location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Friendly and attentive staff We booked a room with a large balcony terrace Cost a bit more but it was worth it Great place to relax and enjoy the view

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about was perfect
Positive_Review: Fabulous friendly staff Excellent location quiet street but in a very busy area Best of all worlds Definitely my future base in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: More healthy options like fruits muesli etc would have been nice
Positive_Review: Very professional and friendly staff Perfect location for visiting central Paris No transport needed everything is only a few walking minutes away

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The price was a little expensive
Positive_Review: Jean Claude was incredibly helpful and charming and made our experience at the hotel delightful The beds were comfortable and the slippers were a nice touch The shower was also nice Ludovic was also extremely helpful organizing a taxi for my friend and I quickly and helped me purchase and print train tickets within minutes Exceptional customer service at this hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Parking nearest was full so had to park 20 mn walk away but dropped luggage at the hotel door before parking so not too bad
Positive_Review: Very convenient friendly staff and good facilities

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: A bit difficult to connect to hotel Wifi Breakfast was expensive given the many cafe options around
Positive_Review: Great little modern boutique hotel conveniently located on the left bank near Ile de la Cite on a quiet corner away from the noise of major streets Short walk to Metro and tons of shops restaurants and cafes in St Germain Rooms were quiet large esp bathroom and comfortable with modern touches Housekeeping did a great job each day making up our room Friendly front desk staff available 24 7 Nice selection of TV channels for international guests

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Rooms may be a little tiny but pretty romantic Parking is an issue
Positive_Review: There are several areas in Paris where you can stay but latin quarter is probably one of the best Close to many landmarks shopping and restaurants I m staying there almost every time when in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: This hotel is in an great location on the Left Bank but just a short walk over the bridge to Notre Dame Located in a quiet street but right near the intersection of Bvd Saint Germain and Bvd Saint Michel The Louvre and Musee d Orsay are within a comfortable 25 minute walk Lots of restaurants and bars nearby although many are very touristy The property appears to have been renovated recently and the facilities are very modern Whilst I know from looking at the rooms plan for the hotel that not all accommodations are created equal our room number 50 was extremely spacious and comfortable Rates on Booking com reasonable by expensive Paris standards Staff were excellent especially Carolina who worked hard to get us access to our room after an early morning arrival from Australia

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great location for exploring the Latin Quarter and St Germain Lovely little hotel clean quiet and comfortable and we got a great discounted rate with a booking made the day before arrival

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: As usual the rooms are small as are most hotel rooms in Europe
Positive_Review: The property is conveniently located near Place San Michel and its subway station Also near many restaurants Notre Dame and Orsay Museum Great staff who were very helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The location was to die for The gorgeous decorations helpful staff wonderful shower my husband said it was the best hotel shower ever and comfortable bed made it perfection

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Only watchout is with the location being so central you inevitably get nearby tourist trap restaurants that are either overpriced or average food We used the guidebook and recommendations from the hotel staff to find good restaurants
Positive_Review: Brilliant location in central Paris near the Seine 2 lovely adjoining rooms perfect for a family with a view of the Saint Severin church Very helpful and friendly staff and very accommodating for children Clean and furnished to a good standard with a lovely Petit Prince gift for our little boy and chocolates for us Good big Monoprix nearby and some lovely restaurants although you have to work out which of the restaurants are tourist traps vs genuinely good French restaurants

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Do not use the hotel s airport shuttle service The hotel reception promised us the journey would take 40 mins and advised us to leave 15 mins earlier at 8 45am in case of traffic We were on time at 8 45 but driver was late by about 25 mins Then driver arranged for another pickup midway through our journey where we had to wait another 15 mins The supposed 40min journey became 1h30min We did make it to the airport on time but we would have preferred to be early and not feel rushed which is why we woke up early in the first place You are better off taking an Uber or a taxi to avoid all these delays This may be the shuttle service s fault not the hotel s but the hotel reception should manage customer expectations better
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Room was small but well appointed

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Boutique classic in the heart of the vibrant Latin Quarter The staff were exceptional and so friendly polite and helpful Our room was well apointed and featured a beautiful little terrace overlooking Saint Severin The Pantheon and the classic roof tops of Paris Sitting on the terrace over Easter listening to the church bells ring out from Notre Dame was unforgettable The location was great close to so many wonderful sights yet it was quiet and peaceful at night There are lots of food options of all prices close by as well as parks and less touristy spots to enjoy I would highly recommend this lovely hotel we usually stay in an apartment when we have visited in the past but as we were only staying 5 days we decided on a hotel and we could not have been more pleased with our choice Loved it

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Extremely comfy with amazing staff they couldn t do enough for us to make our honeymoon trip special Great area around the hotel to eat and drink Thank you all

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Wish I could have stayed longer a great find
Positive_Review: The staff helped us with suggestions for dinner and with getting our plane boarding passes The hotel s d cor and clever use of limited space were terrific

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The location is great I took the train from London and then the metro from Gar du Nord to St Michel Notre Dame It s a couple blocks walk from there Notre Dame is easy walking and there are many restaurants and shops nearby The hotel is clean modern and run by service oriented people who speak English very well

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Have more milk pods in the room there were only three each time Housekeeping forgot to replenish tissues one morning but that s just a small matter
Positive_Review: Location was excellent bed was very comfortable great coffee maker in the room nice toiletries

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Room was comfy and quiet Lovely staff Didn t try the breakfast lots of good cafes around for coffee and croissants Excellent location stone s throw from Notre Dame Cathedral Easy to walk around the main sights of Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Cleaning was ok but not up to 4 standard Room was a little hard to lob around with desk and chair
Positive_Review: Lovely reception staff Great location Great price as we went off season Easy to get to from the airport Comfy bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: No one asked me in the 6 days if I was finding things satisfactory I have been in the hospitality business for 25 years Not good public relations Carpets very old and dirty outside my door I did not like the way the lights in my hall were on a sensor
Positive_Review: I liked a couple people at the front desk and the cleaning people made up the bed just ecellent and the bedding was superb The buffet breakfast was wonderful The bathroom was lovely Clean as could be

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff was amazing helpful and the location was perfect right in the centre but in the quiet area So close to the notre dame and walking distance from everywhere else Special thanks to Mr Jean Claude who was very helpful when we had a missing phone And Mr Ludovic when we were checking out

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The Wi Fi is slow and not always working
Positive_Review: Great place to stay Bed was very comfortable nice and clean room with everything you need The hotel is only few minutes walk from Notre Dame and few great streets where you can eat and have a drink Staff was helpful and friendly The guy at the reception gave us hints on nice restaurants and places to avoid

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Bit of a mix up with our bill being charged twice for room service and for item in mini bar which we did not use otherwise all good
Positive_Review: Bed extremely comfortable Location was great 2 mins from Notre Dame walking distance of many attractions lots of interesting streets shops and restaurants around

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Everything was great as far as hotel is concerned The surrounding Latin Quarter has become a run down tourist trap but the hotel is a nice oasis in the midst of it all
Positive_Review: Fantastic location for going around central Paris Very comfortable and clean hotel with helpful staff Decent price for central Paris also

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I am 25 years old woman and it was my first solo trip The area is live with a lot of things to do close to the metro and it is walk distance 15 40 min to every popular area I felt safe to walk at the area at night which was very important The hotel and the room were very clean and well decorated The staff was very warm and helpful recommendations and reservations for restaurants taxis and more It was nice even just chat with them on the way when i had time Very nice people

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The elevator says that it can carry a total of 300 kilograms however it can barely fit 2 medium sized persons We had to take turns and couldn t take our baggages with us
Positive_Review: Perfect location latin quarter kind staff clean and beautifully designed rooms fast internet connection Haven t tried to food there but the restaurant looked welcoming Close to a metro station st Michel and to Notre dame cathedral La fayette shopping center and jardins de Luxembourg are about a 15 minute walk The area is lively and full of restaurants and pubs I stayed for two nights and had a great time there Recommended to couples and small groups of friends

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I think it is a bit overpriced it is a very basic hotel not with many amedities
Positive_Review: It has all what you need in a hotel location cleanliness comfort and free WIFI They were also kind enough to give me early check in

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: rooms are very small it is hard to move inside the room beds are very narrow and uncomfortable Lifts are to narrow You can not fit in to lift with 3 person
Positive_Review: It is in the heart of Paris close to eveywhere there are several transport options transportation from charles de gaul airport is very easy with only one train you can directly reach to Hotel without expriencing Paris heavy traffic Rooms are very clean and has a good material quality Air condition is fine

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: We were on the top floor of the hotel with a panoramic view of Paris Absolutely beautiful It was a little too cold to lounge on the terrace but we were able to sit in the sun for a while and admire the Eiffel Tower and many more buildings The room was large the bed comfortable Breakfast was plentiful and delicious Everyone was extremely friendly The location in the Latin Quarter was perfect Easy access to the subway as well as to many restaurants in the area Great atmosphere in the evening to go out for a stroll We had a wonderful stay

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Wifi was a little bit spotty
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel in excellent location only 3 min walk from RER B C St Michel Notre Dame station and Metro 10 Cluny la Sorbonne station Just behind the restaurant street of St Michel but in a quiet street

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Absolutely nothing not to like about our stay at this hotel
Positive_Review: The view from the roof terrace was amazing Room 70 on the top floor is worth every penny Furnished beautifully excellent size and watching the Eiffel Tower lit up at night was incredible

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Bath not clean enough lots of hair from previous guests I guess Hairdryer bag just dirty
Positive_Review: The view from terrace Breakfast in it Very quiet at night Location very good just few steps from restaurants and Notre Dame

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: For sure THE best hotel I have ever booked in Paris The facility is just awesome the room we stayed 12 was just perfect incredible care of details the location is perfect and most at all the staff is outstanding and with their kindenes professionalism and savoir faire made our stay perfect and unforgettable form the moment we entered the door You can really feel how they enjoy they work and they enjoy working together We will go back and recommend this Hotel to everyone

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Lobby could use a little updating Felt a little bit dated and cramped
Positive_Review: My room had an Nespresso machine high quality bedding and nice toiletries with a little balcony overlooking the church Hotel is located on a quiet street but close to all the shops and restaurants The location is ideal only 3 minute walk from Saint Michele to RER B C Metro Right off Blvd Saint Germaine and very close to Blvd Saint Michele Couldn t ask for better location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Just minor things Rooms were a bit small but that s to be expected in Paris Also there was some miscommunication about breakfast being included in our room it was not
Positive_Review: Hotel was modern clean and located very close to Notre Dame cathedral and walking distance to the Louvree as well as trains to the airport Eiffel Tower basically all the key attractions Staff were also helpful with any questions and requests we had

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff are fabulous as they are happy helpful The location and style of this hotel was perfect for us as we wanted to experience traditional Paris The hotel is just a short walk to the river restaurants and two of the Hop On Hop Off bus lines

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Maybe the petit d jeuner could be a little bit cheaper compared with others And hope there would be discount for the members
Positive_Review: The location is excellent which is just several minutes from the St Michel Notre Dame and the metro station has elevator for the heavy luggage Besides the service from staff are quite nice they are very patient in helping us and giving dinner suggestions The room is new and cozy and make us feel relaxed

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for our needs the facility was modern clean and well arranged the staff was professional friendly and always patiently helpful the views from the our balcony were wonderful and the mattress was perfect

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: There is some homeless but in the center there are a lot of them anyway and I prefer to have the minibar separate because we bought a lot of cheese and needed to put everything out to have enough place for our things in the small refrigerator
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel very comfortable location near to the Cluny metro station Paris Quartier Latin have great restaurants and there is one supermarket very close and open on Sunday as well The stuff are very nice and helpful and we have an amazing view from the window toward the cathedral

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Super friendly staff very comfortable bed lovely smelling amenities fabulous location airconditioning on what turned out to be the hottest day of the summer and amazingly quiet

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Small room but how much time will you really spend in your hotel room while you are in Paris Noise from other rooms
Positive_Review: Amazing location friendly and helpful staff comfortable bed new bathroom lovely view blackout curtains free wifi great view from room

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The location is perfect It s really close almost every tourist attractions and metro station is 2 minutes from the hotel The hotel is clean the size of our room was ok not too small not too big

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Unfortunately the area just outside the hotel which we thought would be a quiet church square was where groups of men stayed and played cards drank and had others meeting with them Loud and disruptive Several nights our family members had difficulty sleeping and staff had to call the police to deal with the groups Some concerns were even expressed by hotel staff
Positive_Review: Wonderful staff and true Parisienne feeling in lovely rooms in very convenient location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The reception staff were so helpful Attentive to our every need including returning an item that I had left behind in the hotel This hotel was well located in the Latin Quarter with approx 200m to the Notre Dame The room was beautifully decorated and fitted out Couldn t fault this hotel Book it

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: There was nothing to dislike about this hotel I would recommend it to all my friends if it was within their budget
Positive_Review: Great location near really good restaurants in very close proximity to the river Seine Because it s a small hotel it s lovely and quiet and felt very private so I would highly recommend for a single or couples holiday Very helpful friendly staff decent room size with a good shower and shower products comfortable bed a great big terrace with table and chairs and pretty flowers perfect for relaxing in the evening after a long day of sightseeing The hotel also organised my shared taxi pickup to the airport which I d recommend doing as it s much cheaper than getting one out on the street so be sure to ask just leave extra time for other hotel pickups

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: A lot of homeless people in the ally between church and hotel at night so I would stay out of there at night
Positive_Review: So many restaurant near by with great food for a great price

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: My first trip to Europe A little nervous as to what to expect Can not say looking back as to what I did not like but rather the differences in hotel room size Small but quaint
Positive_Review: I made an error when booking my stay and did not allow for travel time Although no refund could be made they did allow an adjustment in breakfast for my stay

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff where all very helpful With traffic chaos due to strikes and floods twice we where rescued by the staff sorting out taxis Ime sorry I can t remember the name of the first but Caroline on the Sunday was excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Very small room for big price Used water bottles weren t replaced when room done in mornings I would describe as a boutique hotel and a bit dated Just isn t 4 5 stars
Positive_Review: Great location very friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: A great location a comfortable room and really friendly and helpful staff We were able to leave our luggage on the last day while we went to explore which was really helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Well the room would profit from a few more square metres and better opportunities to stow the luggage But alas that s Paris
Positive_Review: Nice clean friendly and welcoming hotel in the heart of Paris St Michel Comfortable well equipped room functionl clean and for Paris standards not too small bath room good bed Rather calm even when sleeping with the window open Very friendly staff good breakfast fast and stable WiFi Lots of restaurants around amongst them also a few recommendable ones

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great central location within walking distance of the River Seine and Notre Dame Our room was comfortable and very quiet Great little restaurant next door

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The very slow very small elevator but it has its charm
Positive_Review: The staff is very friendly the room is very clean breakfast is good the baguette and croissant so fresh and the location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France

Positive_Review: The location is great and the staff also

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The location is excellent very close to the river but just slightly away from the most touristy streets The room was small but very comfortable and the staff were friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The reception staff were very welcoming and professional throughout our stay Location simply perfect for a weekend in Paris We will certainly be returning

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France

Positive_Review: superb location central and easy access to metro and RER excellent bed staff very friendly and professional except when we arrived the night receptionist was wasted and took forever to check in pretty sure he got fired though so management seems to be on top of things

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Excellent service from staff excellent room condition and very clean ideal location for experiencing Paris sight seeing fabulous choice of restaurants nearby walking distance Notre Dame and river views at night On main station from CDG airport

Hotel_Name: Hotel Parc Saint Severin Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The room was very very small and the hotel generally needs some attention Our room although clean didn t smell too great initially but after some fresh air it was ok
